item.title: Unlock the Secret to Recording on Your iPhone with the Screen Off - You Won't Believe What Happens Next!
item.description: Introduction Are you an iPhone user who has ever wanted to record something without having to keep the screen of your device on? If so, you are in luck! In this article, we will be discussing how to unlock the secret to recording on your iPhone with the screen off. Overview of the Problem Recording on your iPhone can be a tricky process. Not only do you have to keep the screen of your device on, but you also have to make sure that the device is not in sleep mode.
